title: RVCE IT OR PESU CSE MTECH -which is better for placements?

comments.body: MTech in any private college is definitely not worthy. Definitely not in PES. RVCE might be better.
The quality of the staff is not the best , not enough recognition/credibility in job places and other colleges abroad.
is rvce mtech cse not worth? fees is 7 lakh a year
If the quality is really good, then money shouldn't be an issue bud. Infact you can manage lesser fee ig with good gate score.
Ohh then in that case you have not much options.
is it worth to put 14 lakh for mtech cse considering roi
